name: A Light In The Night
description:
You're a lighthouse keeper!

- Control the Lightbeam with your Mouse

All ships and monsters will follow the light, so they must be navigated to get to the lighthouse safely (ships) or to crash on the cliffs (monsters).

Your objective is to save ships and to  eliminate monsters.

Keep the ships away from monsters or they will be eaten.

Music, Design and Programming were all made by us. 

Also - There is an Easter egg in the main menu.

Submission for Brackeys GameJam 2022.2, theme: "You´re not alone".
